faq

What is coworking?

Coworking is a new way of professional collaboration by people that not necessarily work on the same company or project. The aim is to provide a professional and social network without the dependency on a specific employment. That work is mostly done in flexible workspaces that are specifically organized and designed to meet the needs of coworkers.

How much does it cost to participate in the festival?

It is free of charge to try out the spaces! This also applies to all events that are listed in our schedule.

Do I need to register somewhere?

No, but to keep the overview and keep track of which spaces you like best you can register at OneCoworking.

Which Coworking Spaces are participating in the Coworking Festival?

There are a dozen participating spaces. Check out the coworking-map for details.

My Coworking Space wants to join. How to become a Partner Space?

Please fill out this form and we will contact you with further details.
